author: Anonymous Mouse
title: Pset 6 submission error
question: Hi, I kept running into issues trying to submit my problem set. It kept telling me that a certain line is longer than 80 characters but when I check it by clicking the line and see how many characters there are, they are all below 80. I tried to separate the code into the next line regardless but it still indicates that I have passed the limit. I'm not sure what went wrong so I submitted my problem set to the admin email, hope that is okay.
student_answer: Hey, not sure if you have the maximum character width guide setup (it makes a line across the screen if you’ve passed the character limit at any point) but I’ve found this helps a lot! Also remember that spaces can cause the line to be over the limit too
